headline: Coca-Cola's Brand Mix Shifts: Is the Zero-Sugar Push Paying Off?
summary: Brand mix diversification is KO's key growth driver. Its Zero Sugar lineup fuels a broader shift to health-focused drinks, making up 30% of its global volume.

raw.headline: Coca-Cola's Brand Mix Shifts: Is the Zero-Sugar Push Paying Off?

headline: FTC's Robinson-Patman Case Against Pepsi Goes Flat <br /
summary: On May 22, 2025, the Federal Trade Commission voted 3-0 to dismiss without prejudice the Robinson-Patman Act 1 case it initiated on January 17, 2025 against PepsiCo, Inc. in the U.S. District Court...
